content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Storage chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5) containing iron ore and copper ore
- Burner inserter (x=-26.5, y=-59.5) 
- Stone furnace (x=-25.0, y=-59.0) with coal fuel and copper ore
- Storage chest (x=-22.5, y=-58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates
- Burner inserter (x=-23.5, y=-58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-18.0, y=-53.0)
- Storage chest (x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
- Burner inserter (x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
- Stone furnace (x=-15.0, y=-51.0)
- Storage chest (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter (x=-13.5, y=-50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Storage chest (x=41.5, y=-80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (x=41.5, y=-79.5)

### Power Generation Complex at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (x=-4.5, y=12.5)
- Boiler (x=-4.5, y=16.0)
- Offshore pump (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (x=5.5, y=13.5)
- Burner inserter (x=6.5, y=13.5)
- Assembling machine (x=8.5, y=13.5) for automation science pack
- Output chest (x=11.5, y=13.5)
- Burner inserter (x=10.5, y=13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Use inspect_inventory() to check container contents before extraction
- Handle cases where expected items are not present

### Errors with furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and raw materials before attempting to extract products
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract products
- Check furnace status and contents before operations

### Assembly machine resource shortages
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Ensure proper supply chain of materials to assembly machines
- Monitor input chest contents to maintain continuous production

### Belt and inserter blockages
- Monitor inserter warnings for "waiting for space in destination"
- Ensure output containers have space available
- Place appropriate sink objects at inserter drop positions
